events.name: St. Louis Cardinals at Chicago Cubs

headlines.description: â€” Javier Assad pitched four scoreless innings in his major league debut and combined with four relievers on a five-hitter as the Chicago Cubs cooled off the St. Louis Cardinals 2-0 on Tuesday in the first game of a doubleheader.
headlines.shortLinkText: Assad, 4 relievers help Cubs stop Cards' 8-game streak, 2-0

video.headline: Cubs take Game 1 of doubleheader in shutout fashion
